name: Lionsgate
description:
This is my very first own small project, and I'm lucky to be among the awesome people making prototypes for this jam! I want to thank Chris Murphy for his Udemy course on Unreal Engine, it helped me to drastically raise my confidence and awareness regarding UE4 editor.

There is no music or sounds as I hadn't have time and skills  to introduce them into this demo. Just a very simple concept on which I'm intended to elaborate in near future. 

For EPIC stuff: I realize that I'm not a real contestant for this jam, so don't take more than 1 minute of your time on my game ;) Thx for doing this all you awesome people!
